title: react-dom wrong package from npm?
body:
Hi,
I executed just now:

```
npm install react react-dom
```

But the react-dom package version that is being downloaded seems is not the right package:

```
$ ll node_modules/react-dom
total 48
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   967B May  5  2014 Cakefile
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   1.0K May  5  2014 MIT-LICENSE
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   1.9K May  6  2014 README.md
drwxr-xr-x  3 erik  staff   102B May  6  2014 examples
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   1.3K Sep 16 19:59 package.json
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   2.1K May  5  2014 react-dom.js
-rw-r--r--  1 erik  staff   1.2K May  5  2014 react-dom.min.js
drwxr-xr-x  3 erik  staff   102B May  5  2014 spec
```

and watching the package.json, it is pointing to: https://github.com/EtienneLem/react-dom

I'm doing something wrong or something is going wrong?

```
$ cat node_modules/react-dom/package.json
{
  "name": "react-dom",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "DOM is a `React.DOM` wrapper with — subjectively — more sanity and awesome helpers",
  "author": {
    "name": "Etienne Lemay",
    "email": "etienne@heliom.ca"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/EtienneLem/react-dom.git"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/EtienneLem/react-dom",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/EtienneLem/react-dom/issues"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "keywords": [
    "react",
    "dom"
  ],
  "main": "react-dom.js",
  "devDependencies": {
    "jasmine-node": "2.0.0-beta4",
    "react": "0.10.0",
    "uglify-js": "2.4.13",
    "colors": "0.6.2"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jasmine-node ./spec"
  },
  "_id": "react-dom@0.1.0",
  "dist": {
    "shasum": "6c821d418caed4f8ed39424cf0fad36f03fb35c4",
    "tarball": "http://registry.npmjs.org/react-dom/-/react-dom-0.1.0.tgz"
  },
  "_from": "react-dom@>=0.1.0 <0.2.0",
  "_npmVersion": "1.4.3",
  "_npmUser": {
    "name": "EtienneLem",
    "email": "etienne@heliom.ca"
  },
  "maintainers": [
    {
      "name": "EtienneLem",
      "email": "etienne@heliom.ca"
    }
  ],
  "directories": {},
  "_shasum": "6c821d418caed4f8ed39424cf0fad36f03fb35c4",
  "_resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/react-dom/-/react-dom-0.1.0.tgz",
  "readme": "ERROR: No README data found!"
}
```

Best Regards.
